fields.name: Action
fields.description: The action payload of the job step.

fields.name: Credential
fields.description: The resource ID of the job credential that will be used to connect to the targets.

fields.name: ExecutionOptions
fields.description: Execution options for the job step.

fields.name: Output
fields.description: Output destination properties of the job step.

fields.name: StepId
fields.description: The job step's index within the job. If not specified when creating the job step, it will be created as the last step. If not specified when updating the job step, the step id is not modified.

fields.name: TargetGroup
fields.description: The resource ID of the target group that the job step will be executed on.
